lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I am impressed by Mary\'s courage and ambition. I wanted to encourage her to keep doing all that she can to make life better for herself, her family and her community.
lenders.occupational_info: My group BW2Network hosts Health, wealth and fitness workshops to mentor, coach and educate women entreprenuers. We are five women over 40 who strongly believe in helping our community to grow.

lenders.name: Diva
lenders.loan_because:
I was in need for many years as a single mother and the universe has blessed me over and over again... now , I want to give back in a way that actually makes a difference to a specific person! 
We all can help each other and the world becomes a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sales and I love it! I love what I do and want to be more successful to give back more and more!

lenders.name: Emilio
lenders.loan_because: I want others to benefit from the opportunities that I have had.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach others how to speak other languages.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want to invest directly in real projects I can see and understand instead of just donating to non-profit organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult with businesses and investment groups on how to use environmental performance to create competitive advantage.

lenders.name: Mitsch Family
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Our small business works with major companies in the US and globally, helping to accelerate leadership development and allow people be more productive in all aspects of their lives.

lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Health, happiness and hope.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: This is the most satisfaction for the dollar that I see out there.  A great organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy houses and fix them up.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Thea
lenders.loan_because: i feel that it is a good way to show that I care to the world

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I can and I want to

lenders.name: Tony castellon
lenders.loan_because: I loaon because I can, and God give me the oportunity to live in the greatest country in the wide world USA. I came here with nothing, now I can help others in need. GOD Bless United States of America, Land of the Free and the Home of the Brave.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to help, specially those that live in third world countries.

lenders.name: Michel
lenders.loan_because: My father worked with the world bank and loaned billions of dollars.  The least I can do is loan a few thousand.\r\n\r\nI grew up in Europe, Africa, and Central America and it feels good to help those in the countries where I learned so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a silicon valley technology guy.  I am not a billionaire but I have done fairly well.

lenders.name: GISdude
lenders.loan_because: To help someone achieve their goal. It must be immensely satisfying for a person that comes from poverty that I can\'t even imagine to become a successful business person.
lenders.occupational_info: I make maps.

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: A gift was given to me from my son & his family who are Kiva supporters. It was a wonderful gift and I want to pass it along in hopes that others will do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: We take people on hunting & fishing trips who would like to go with someone who knows the area. It is called outfitting & guiding and is a business that allows us to be outdoors a lot! It is often difficult to do the simple things, like laundry, when you are in the backcountry. Dee encourages others to help out when you can and smile much.

lenders.name: Lookout Mobile
lenders.loan_because: Lookout Mobile loans because we feel that all people, from any country, should have access to funds that will support their dreams, aspirations, creativity and sustainability. We encourage all Australian people to do the same...
lenders.occupational_info: Coming soon

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Stig & family
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans is probably the best way to support people in need
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting people in our company to achieve their best.

lenders.name: marthianne
lenders.loan_because: A small good deed could change someones life forever.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to travel and also do volunteer work.  The most rewarding work I've ever done is the volunteer work.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: It helps people that need help. They deserve to live a little bit better.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent sales from companies to the companies wanting to buy the products.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: Every one deserves a chance at economic freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the military.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I would ever really need.  Kiva is a beautiful way to put resources to use!

lenders.name: Shane McP
lenders.loan_because: It is a hand up, not a hand out. People just need a chance to prove themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently the founder of an IT and computer service company. I also dabble in real estate.

lenders.name: Greg & Negin
lenders.loan_because: we figure if we can\'t be entrepreneurs ourselves, we should support people who can.
lenders.occupational_info: Greg is a graduate student working on his PhD in Computer Science.  Negin is a Criminalist who gathers and test samples from crime scenes to put the bad guys away.

lenders.name: Tore Brevik
lenders.loan_because: I think farmers around the world should get a opportunity to develope their farms to supply their families with all their needs.
lenders.occupational_info: Farmer with milk and meat as the main production at  the farm. Married with four fosterkids living with us on the farm at the moment.

lenders.name: Raj
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is the single most effective form of poverty alleviation.

lenders.name: hanxue
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better himself/herself
lenders.occupational_info: I provide IT solutions to a multi-national company

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great concept to help others around the world.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed by God with health, wealth and happiness and I wish to share a little bit of these with those who were not given the blessings that I have received.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired entrepreneur who is willing to give help to aspiring entrepreneurs throughout the world. Website link below shows where my loans are at work.

lenders.name: Silvana
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to go through hard times. I am from Bulgaria and my family has experienced financial problems in the early 90s. I think that helping out in this way is a really cool idea and has a huge potential worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: PhD student in Economics.

lenders.name: Nick Lucking
lenders.loan_because: Micro-loans to the 3rd world interest me.
lenders.occupational_info: Thought Horse, Inc

lenders.name: anthony
lenders.loan_because: A Christian man is the most free lord of all, and subject to none; a Christian man is the most dutiful servant of all, and subject to every one. --Martin Luther, 1520
lenders.occupational_info: My name's Anthony. I live in Orlando and I've studied microfinance/microcredit for three years with the hope of learning enough to start a nonprofit. I like lending cash to the food and agriculture sectors... farms, groceries, bakeries, cafes, markets, etc Brave women starting indie businesses are more likely to receive funding, but I'm also happy to fund groups and collectives. You should watch this great documentary, Globalisation is Good, by former anarchist Johann Norberg: http://tinyurl.com/5ea5ug and read his book In Defense of Global Capitalism Feel free to message me to discuss microfinance and share new ideas

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel better to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I  work in customer service for Fresh Start Bakeries which supplies bread to major fast food chains. I  process orders for Jack-In-The-Box . I am also married with five children. I know and understand that it is not always easy and every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It's all about giving a helping hand and being a part of something outside of myself

lenders.name: Leigh
lenders.loan_because: I've been through hard times with very little money for essentials, but I didn't have the entrepreneurial spirit of the people on the KIVA website.  My admiration goes out to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I order books for my company.

lenders.name: Bree
lenders.loan_because: I believe microloans are one of the best ways to empower people and begin to alleviate poverty throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead adventure trips around the world for a company called Explore Worldwide.  Check them out at    www.explore.co.uk

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I respect people who are hard-working and honest.

lenders.name: Søren Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I like the thoughts behind micro financing and think this is my way to make a sustainable difference in this world
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at Copenhagen Business School studying Auditing

lenders.name: Tim Travis
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that in some small way I am helping to improve the quality of life for these hard-working entreprenuers and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entreprenuer--starting up a business--much like those who we support through Kiva.

lenders.name: Tuck
lenders.loan_because: To help people with their living
lenders.occupational_info: i go to school for learning.  I\'m in first grade.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I study physics at a university. I have great hopes for science and equality.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: \"We can\'t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.\" Dr. Loretta Scott

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a High tech company.

lenders.name: Dr. John and Marcia
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the blessings of our life with others.  This idea is so beautiful in its\' simplicity, what a wonderful way to share the LOVE and change the world!
lenders.occupational_info: Operate Center of Life Chiropractic and Pilates Studio in a small town in Maryland and participate in global chiropractic out-reach missions.  The practice incorporates an Honor Fee that allows all individuals to access care regardless of economic situation.

lenders.name: Harmony
lenders.occupational_info: I test computer software programs and am passionate about the pursuit of software quality.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed and feel good about themselves and what they are able to do.
lenders.occupational_info: When people have had difficult and terrible things happen in their lives, I try to help them have better lives through talk and other kinds of therapy.  These therapies help to change the way we view ourselves and the world, and lead to healing.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because:
When I needed it, Someone gave me a leg up.        
________Beware Of the Penguins!!!!!_______
lenders.occupational_info: My company does electrical & computer wiring for businesses and homes.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I believe microloans stand a chance at changing lives for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and instructions that help people understand how to use technology, like computer software or cell phones.

lenders.name: Lyle & Zach
lenders.loan_because: What better way than to help those who are taking steps to change their world. When all is said and done, it is the small gestures to complete strangers that matter the most. It restores our humanity and it feels just great. It also helps my son Zach understand that he also can contribute through our combined loan and make a difference.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: In a recent trip to South Africa, I had a chance to visit seveal rural HIV clinics. In that trip I saw first hand the devastation of AIDS epidemic in Sub-Saharan Africa. Although we are far from a mdical cure, one of the mitigating factors in spread of HIV is poverty. This picture was taken in front of one of the clinics.

lenders.name: Emily aka crazycakes
lenders.loan_because: a little $$ to me is a lot to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: i have a small business. i make all sorts of pretty things to sell.

lenders.name: Celine
lenders.loan_because: Je prete car je veux supporter les gens qui sont prets a travailler fort pour aider leur famille.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: After travelling to East Africa and seeing what needs there are and how much I have been blessed with, I want to provide for those who are trying to make a better life for themselves, their family and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with adults who have lost their ability to communicate after having a brain injury.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Social Entrepreneurship is the only model that will work in bringing the  developing countries to our economic levels. We are also starting businesses and want to help others that need entrepreneurial experience.
lenders.occupational_info: We are business students across Canada that refill and sell recycled ink cartridges to other students across Canada!

lenders.name: philip
lenders.loan_because: When I needed help, people unselfishly came to my needs, Through the grace of god, I can now give back.

lenders.name: Liane
lenders.loan_because: it is a privilege to do so.

lenders.name: Calvin & Patty
lenders.loan_because: I believe the Bible teaches that meeting the needs of others demonstrates Gods love in a practical way. Also, I needed help once and others helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures and sells drawer slides / hardware for kitchen cabinetry and office furniture.

lenders.name: Lauren & Owen
lenders.loan_because: it gives us a chance to make a difference in this world, no matter how old we are
lenders.occupational_info: We are in school. Lauren is in grade 5, Owen is in grade 1.

lenders.name: Wilkinson Family
lenders.loan_because: We want our boys to learn the importance of caring for and supporting others.  We are all human with the same basic needs --- food, clothing, shelter, health care, and a job.  It's our responsibility as citizens of the world to help elevate those who lack these basic needs.

lenders.name: claire
lenders.loan_because: the whole world is my backyard

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: My sister gave me the a gift of a Kiva loan for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize workers in Texas, United States.

lenders.name: patrick
lenders.loan_because: I work in the internet industry and I love to see how the internet can bring us all closer together.  I respect hard work, no matter where in the world .
lenders.occupational_info: Internet Marketing Executive

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much, I want to give as freely.

lenders.name: Wade
lenders.loan_because: There are economic solutions to human problems.
lenders.occupational_info:
I finished my degree in International Business and Management at Dickinson College; my studies also include Latin-American studies, Economics, Spanish and Portuguese.

Today, I am an Engineer officer in the US Army, recently re-deployed from Operation Enduring Freedom.

lenders.name: James Paterson
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro financing opportunities are one of the best ways that the economy of developing communities can be supported.
lenders.occupational_info: Always pay it forward.

lenders.name: Abhijit
lenders.loan_because: we all need to.

lenders.name: Les
lenders.loan_because: I believe people should have the opportunity to beter their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of patients in an outpatient clinic in a small town in California.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I see Kiva as a good opportunity to help others in the time of need.  A step closer to global prosperity, with one entrepreneur at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the go-to guy when people are having problems wth their systems.

lenders.name: Eric Skotmyr
lenders.occupation: What ever needs to be done.
lenders.loan_because: Being human, I am embarrassed by the state of the World and my efforts to date, let alone my inability to better it. If I was in need ... I would hope to find a self empowering opportunity like KIVA to better my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have done many jobs in many fields. My training is in design, photography and the printing industry but I am fortunate enough to afford time now to explore my artistic inspirations ... I am rehabing an old house in some new ways, and renting it to low income tenants and studying renewable lifestyles that offer hope for change. Too little too late?

lenders.name: tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I can. I\'ve seen how much a dollar can do and I would like to help those that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I\\\'m a current college student who aspires to travel and do business.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: Life is about interacting with people not merely reacting to them.

lenders.name: Uyen
lenders.loan_because: i wanna.

lenders.name: Josh & Melissa
lenders.occupational_info: A Student and a Nurse

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: Eventhough we all go through hard times it is important to remeber that there are people who are less fortunate than us and who we can help. Knowing that I brought a smile to someone\'s face at the end of the day makes me smile too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently an at home mom, who dedicates all her time to the little love of her life.

lenders.name: Oliver & Susanne
lenders.loan_because: Our small contribution is combined with others, which can do so much more then we can do alone.
lenders.occupational_info:
Oliver is a project manager for the New Jersey Early Intervention System.

Susanne is an Occupational Therapist. She works with grade school children to help them achieve.

lenders.name: Maxime Dieudonné
lenders.occupational_info: Very exciting

lenders.name: Lori, Mike, Mac + Sawyer
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other families.
lenders.occupational_info: Happy.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife Leslie and I sing songs "to lift spirits and soothe souls"--a combination of folk, traditional, and gospel.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Small loans can greatly improve lives
lenders.occupational_info: I travel the world and see how lucky I am compared to most of the people on our planet

lenders.name: Vermont Family
lenders.occupational_info: Training and education in methods of psychology from Japan

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: The journey of a thousand miles begins with the first step.
lenders.occupational_info: Customer Relations Manager

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Assisting and connecting with people around the world feels great.  I give with gratitude for the blessings in my life.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I love this idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a computer programmer helping corporations desgin web sites.

lenders.name: The Barsches
lenders.loan_because: we are entrepreneurs and admire the entrepreneurial spirit in others.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a variety of Internet ventures.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: this seems like such a great idea. It's great to be harnessing the technology of the internet in this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own internet business.

lenders.name: Shaun
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this program gives people the opportunity to overcome poverty through hard work. The money that is loaned gives them a goal to reach, which in my opinion is the greatest motivator in providing for family and self to make a better life possible
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a full time student at Houston Baptist University and work full time at the Weekley Family YMCA. At the Y I work in membership and plan on entering the Y\'s international and outreach program

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: When I heard about this I thought it was such a simple way of helping thosewho want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Health Kinesiology and train other people to become therapists. Health Kinesiology is aprofound but simple healing modality.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: It\'s an easy way to show support to our Brothers and Sisters who are trying to get ahead and help their communities too.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I received the initial $100 as a Christmas gift a few years ago.  Since then I have diligently kept up with the businesses I've loaned to.  I've now loaned to 6 different businesses and looking to put more money into my lender account!
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee sales agents who reserve vacations for guests at Copper Mountain Resort in Colorado - a leading ski resort in North America

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving others an opportunity to make a difference in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I offer people a simple way of adding more fruits and vegetables to their daily diet.  Eating a whole food, plant based diet is the key to being healthy.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: it's really the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an investment bank as an analyst who invests in companies that we hope will produce new medicine to treat disease.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I really want to help people if I am able.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at West Virginia University.

lenders.name: Dimitri
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to save money on products they already use and I help people to make more money.

lenders.name: Damian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving the fishing net instead of the fish.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping
lenders.occupational_info: Middle Manager in a company that provides environmental services to industrial and commercial businesses

lenders.name: Danielle Fragale
lenders.loan_because: I think one should always help others. And here at Kiva, I can help people even if I have very little amount of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work full time at a restaurant. I take orders from the customers and I write them down. Then I pass it onto the chef who prepares the order. When done, he passes me the order and I deliver it to the customers. I also go to college and I hope to be a veterinarian doctor someday.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is our responsibility to help those who had the misfortune not to be born into one of the richest countries of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Lyme Disease ended my career as professional weaver so I am trying to feed my artistic self through painting instead.

lenders.name: Bowen Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others.

lenders.name: Stephanie Demery
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: Improving relationships and lives.

lenders.name: Dickie
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people and we have been so blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the small town we live in.  I just help things run properly behind the scenes like roads,the sewer system, maintaining parks, etc..

lenders.name: Little Lenders
lenders.loan_because: We loan to make the world a better place

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: because the greatest amount of people can be lifted up economically by capitalism
lenders.occupational_info: recruiting and giving smart creative people a vehicle to better themselves, the people  who purchase our services and the investors in our company

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: i loan through kiva because it allows me to see that i am contributing to the sustainability of a community.  "Freedom in one area seems to help to foster freedom in others." - Amartya Sen
lenders.occupational_info: i study philosophy as a graduate student.

lenders.name: Chris's family
lenders.loan_because: Gods Grace
lenders.occupational_info: I build communities

lenders.name: D & D
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us and we enjoying giving back.  It's a wonderful feeling to know that you are helping someone who has no where to turn to better their life and the lives of their families.  It is our hope that they too will eventually be able to share with others.  We try to pattern our lives after that of our Lord & savior, Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: to help make a differrence in the world.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I was given an oppertunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I build communities, not just houses, but a place where people love and support each other.

lenders.name: Kristina Williams
lenders.occupation: Wife of a Farmer (cattle, sheep, citrus)
lenders.loan_because: To  encourage fair trading practices and offer encouragement to other agricultural farmers.
lenders.occupational_info: We trade cattle and sheep on our 1,100 acre hill country farm. We also grow 150 acres of oranges, mandarines and lemons.

lenders.name: kay
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit has always made sense to me, from the time I first learned about it while I was teaching an environmental science class.  And my loans honor those who made loans to me when I was in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my mother and my husband, garden, work in the library and sew.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: People can take pride in their lives when they take pride in their work.  Handouts do not do this, business loans (structured the right way) do.
lenders.occupational_info:
Always a student...
Though I've realized that doing good should have a clear purpose.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can afford a little to make a difference.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: Develop software for satellites that monitor long term global climate change.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs to help the rest of the world.

lenders.name: Jayron & Danny
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Kindergarten in a multicultural school. My husband is a graduate student.

lenders.name: Derrick & Hayley
lenders.loan_because: in an increasingly networked world we can and should.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the best ideas I have ever heard about.  This is an idea that can actually do something to help people and the world.  I don't usually care as most ideas are to macro to be useful.  This project gets money to the people who need it directly, to help their businesses grow.

lenders.name: Jackson
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: One day I would like to have my own business...combining my love of photography, textiles, and jewelry design. In the meantime I would like to loan to other creative souls - Seeing them succeed will hopefully galvanize me to eventually start my own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently help companies with their marketing efforts, via their web site, emails, and mail.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: There's no better way to reach out and touch another life halfway around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I manage and preserve historical documents for future generations.

lenders.name: Birgitte
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving a man a fishing rod instead of givning him a fish, the rod will be able to feed him and his family and will give him the opportunity to sell at the local market.\r\nIn that way he can help his fellow citizens, the animals and the nature surrounding him, in the long run.\r\n
lenders.occupational_info: Se the above :)

lenders.name: patrick
lenders.loan_because: I support the idea of being self sufficient. If lending money makes a difference, than here you go!
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to help people find their drives and passion and put those into effect! I also support company management to determine their strategy and move them in a place where they can be the best they can be.

lenders.name: Thijs
lenders.loan_because: Finally I've have found a direct way to help a little bit. I do believe in adding microcredit to the common ways in developing the poorer areas of the world. Hopefully more people will following the KIVA.org!
lenders.occupational_info: Travelling the world as a tourleader in the past and now selling travelguides and -maps to other travellers in my specialized travelbookshop in the northern part of Holland (city of Groningen), I feel myself responsible for the world around me. That\'s the main reason to join KIVA

lenders.name: Guirec
lenders.loan_because: J'ai trouvé l'approche de Kiva très séduisante, m'offrant une possibilité d'essayer une voie alternative de contribution au financement de projets, que j'espère plus directement efficace. Hablo español. I am speaking english.
lenders.occupational_info: Je travaille dans une agence de Coopération au Développement.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English Language teacher from Alaska.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I don't want the money and they do.
lenders.occupational_info: I learn.

lenders.name: Charlann
lenders.loan_because: I want families to be able to provide an education for their children.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I want to have a more direct involvement with the causes I support. I firmly believe in microlending as the most powerful and direct way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage business relationships across North and South America, promoting open source (Linux) software.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: it feels like I can really make a difference to someone\'s life
lenders.occupational_info: I use Health kinesiology and Bowen Technique to help people improve their health, wellbeing and personal development

lenders.name: Lory

I have had ALS (Lou Gerhigs disease) for nine years, statistically I should have been dead long ago While I am  paralyzed from my neck down I am still able to operate my wheel chair and computer and I  find that I can inspire those recently stricken with the disease That is now my job.  

odessaguy@yahoo.com

lenders.name: Smart Baitani
lenders.loan_because:
I strongly believe John F Kenedy was right when he said "...asking His blessings and His help, but knowing that here on earth God's work must truly be our own." (JFK, January 20,1961)
And another man wisely said: "You make a living by what you get but a life by what you give." (Winston Churchill).
lenders.occupational_info: Born and raised in Bukoba, Tanzania. After graduating his MBA (Projects Management/Entrepreneurship) from Minnesota, Smart decided to start a nonprofit, called COSAD  so that he could closely  play a role in creating vibrant communities in rural Tanzania.Since 2001 COSAD has been developing various empirical business models using yet holistic and Appreciative Inquiry (IA) approaches in pioneering solutions that can lead into creation of sustainable grassroots entrepreneurship.COSAD, Inc: (Compassionate Solutions for Africa\'s Development) is a Minnesota based 501 (c) 3 nonprofit organization devoted to empowering individuals by providing support and innovative solutions through community projects development.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because:
Because entrepreneurship, innovation and the human spirit are not limited by geography and that capitalism is the undeniable source of self-improvement, freedom and liberty. 

All I ask is that when you find success you use your resources to improve your community and the world we all live in. Share you knowledge with those around you, empower neighbors, insuring that when the tide rises, all boats rise.
lenders.occupational_info:
Currently, I am producing a feature documentary on the Chicago Cubs. Its been a fantastic experience. My partners and I have several films in production and also finance documentaries and low budget independents. 

In addition, we fund small to medium sized ventures. We look for entrepreneurs that share our values and ideals. I also spend a lot of time volunteering here at home. Giving back and helping others will always keep your heart in tune, I believe that.

lenders.name: Umbreen
lenders.loan_because: I think its the right way to get real, radical change and to correct the imbalance we see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a website that let's people connect to buy and sell cars.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the socially conscious clothing company, Edun. Our focus is to help Africa (and other 3rd world areas) build a better economy, and future through trade, education, and technical skills. I design Men's clothing for the brand, and then help the factories develop the clothes.

lenders.name: Barbara and Lexa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microlending as a source of capital to businesses such as these
lenders.occupational_info: My working life was with a government agency devoted to helping entrepreneurs and I continue to volunteer with a SCORE a national organization with that purpose.

lenders.name: nathan xaviar
lenders.loan_because: This is a way for me to give back. I remember when I was in need of a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: We invest in real estate properties across the United States. We have properties listed in Indiana, Pennsylvania, Ohio and New York. If interested in purchasing rehabbed & newly remodeled properties e-mail us at magnanimoushyip@hotmail.com

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: It can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Advising organizations how to plan and succeed

lenders.name: Gerhard
lenders.loan_because: Give some one a fish and you feed them for a day. Teach them to fish and you feed them for a lifetime. Perhaps with a loan for better gear they can feed their whole family, and enhance the local economy as well. I believe opportunities like Kiva do just that.

lenders.name: Dixie
lenders.loan_because: It's easy, it's effective.  It's a small contribution by me, but a big impact on someone's livelihood.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need in a very real and personal way.

lenders.name: Jeff,Susan,Lily & Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: We want to give to people who need it, not the banks.

lenders.name: John Elbing
lenders.loan_because: I trust the people to know what they need to improve their world. I like the "personal" contact.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I was given the opportunity by a friend.
lenders.occupational_info: entering information into the company's network

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have been born in a country where opportunities for success and a better life run rampant. Other less fortunate individuals across the globe deserve an opportunity to better their lives, and I'm blessed enough to be able to help them in that regard. Thank goodness for Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an I.T. dude. Nobody would understand if I told them. Work Hard -> Play Harder

lenders.name: Wingate Cain
lenders.loan_because: Paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: College Administrator

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: it was a gift to us at Christmas from our son and his family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer who does accident reconstruction in the Tampa, FL area

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: everyone should help their neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: Business accounting and administration

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It empowers everyone involved.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org shows you how even a small contribution adds up to make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Steven & Angelina
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed in so many way, we just want to give back. We enjoy helping and voluntering. Thanks KIVA for providing this service.
lenders.occupational_info: Operations consultant for banks and financial firms.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Partner Development for a large software company.

lenders.name: Niran
lenders.loan_because: I believe in 'entrepreneurial spirit' and that access to capital should not slow down  the progress of so many people throughout our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I examine connections between business and social and environmental issues in a variety of contexts.  I do this through teaching, research, and outreach activities at my local university.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I feel we have an obligation to help people in any way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hydrologist.  I forecast floods to help save lives and reduce property damage.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher working to help other teachers integrate technology into their curriculum. I work in the public schools in Massachusetts, USA

lenders.name: Tahir
lenders.loan_because: I want to create wealth and abundance in developing countries
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a middleman for insurances and mortgages in the Netherlands

lenders.name: Team Pad Thai
lenders.loan_because: The group of us loan because we love microbuses, pad thai, and booze.  And, most importantly, because we believe in the interconnection among all people in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students in education, ministry, engineering, and law.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the right to make a living for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer.

lenders.name: Carl-Lykke
lenders.loan_because: I have the possibility to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
Like a normal architect designs a house and decides where the rooms should be, which materials to use, and how the house should look, I as an IT Architect, designs computer systems and decides which hardware and software to use, how the system should interact with other systems, and how people can use the system. I don't build the system, but I tell the experts how they should build it.
I talk with people!

lenders.name: Katherine S
lenders.loan_because: This is my wedding gift to my son and daughter in law
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate the condition of mechanical, electrical and plumbing systems in buildings

lenders.name: Liesje
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed, and others are so in need of just basic food and water for their families.   The thought of helping someone with the tools needed to help support themselves and their family gives me such joy.

lenders.name: Aneet
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a living angel in my life who makes me smile and he has inspired me to live an amazing life.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I subscribe to the \"Give a man a fish...\" adage.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop applications for users in order to make them more efficient.

lenders.name: Steve & Janet
lenders.loan_because: We like to help and want to give this a try.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet sales and birthplace nursing for new mothers and babies.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money to help substance abusers recover from substance abuse.

lenders.name: ursula
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others. The idea that I can donate so little and yet change someone elses life in a positive way is amazing.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a licensed veterinary technician. Basically a nurse for animals. I work for the ASPCA mobile clinic. We provide free & low cost spay and neuter for animals of owners who are on public assistance.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.occupational_info: Reporter/News Producer

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do...
lenders.occupational_info: I manage money, investing it in businesses like the ones we see here, just a bit bigger :)

lenders.name: Tyler & James
lenders.loan_because: For the cost of one meal, I can help someone support their family. We study economics in high school and college, and teachers always mention 'the poor'; they say there's nothing we can do - through loaning money to those in need, there is something we can do. If I can help to change one person's life, then my loans are worthwhile.
lenders.occupational_info: Tyler is currently a student, and also works as a website developer. Jimmy is also a student. Our hobbies include photography, politics, and food.

lenders.name: Bob and Stef
lenders.loan_because: We were inspired by the lending done by our local Church
lenders.occupational_info: Stef and I both work at a major pharmaceutical company in the US.  While we each have very different jobs we both share a common goal...to help the company discovery, develop and sell new safe medicines around the world.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: It is my first time doing something like this but I would like to have faith in the concepts of microloans. I like that it feels like a more personal way of helping than just donating to charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies secure the ways in which they handle data.

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.loan_because: I really didn't need that latte or magazine or fishing rod as much as I thought I did.
lenders.occupational_info: Pirate engineer.

lenders.name: Joe & Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want others to succeed as I have been given the opportunity to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am Chief Engineer of a five man crew that operates and maintains the Heating, Ventilating and Air Conditioning systems in a 26 story high rise office tower in San Francisco, Ca. U.S.A.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life thanks to the help of many people. I want to give to others so that they might be as blessed as I have been.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the President/CEO of a manufacturing firm.

lenders.name: S,K,&K
lenders.loan_because: We like to see to whom we are lending. The idea of rotating lending is exciting; many, hopefully, will benefit.
lenders.occupational_info: We have several different careers from airline industry to Chinese medicine to construction.

lenders.name: Rayma
lenders.loan_because: I don't wanna wait for someone else to do it while I have a chance.  It's nice to feel like I'm actually making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student by day but really I'm a traveler, volunteer, lover of the world, and global soul.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: justice demands it.

lenders.name: Luciana & Eduardo
lenders.loan_because: We want to reward people's initiative and entrepreneurship spirit.

lenders.name: Yun Huang Yong
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to better understand the impact of microlending.

lenders.name: Ronald & Christine
lenders.loan_because: I respect people who take the initiative to start their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult with businesses about how to pay and manage their employees.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to participate in micro loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work for the local government. Now, I work  two days a week.as a teacher in a middle school.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to encourage the entrepreneurial spirit
lenders.occupational_info: I do training courses for adults who work in international companies and need to better understand the differences between them and their international partners.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on putting technology into transport.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: the world improves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a veterinarian who works with dogs and cats, owns a veterinary hospital, and can appreciate the effort needed to start any business.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: 1.) It has been proven that small loans given to the poorer population have a much higher repayment than to other populations.\r\n2.) In my faith it is important to care for those who are unable to meet general living needs. Small loans are a wonderful way of getting some short-term assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying Development Administration, which is basically to develop efforts to reduce poverty and raise standards of living around the globe.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: it's easy to do and you feel good about helping someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure our Business Partners have the training they need to sell my company's software products/solutions.
